scenario.name: uac_recv_487
scenario.send: SUBSCRIBE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "Тест PICK UP" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] SUBSCRIBE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Event: dialog Accept: application/dialog-info+xml Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0

recv.action:
<ereg regexp=".*(early).*" search_in="msg" check_it="true" assign_to="dummy,check_state"/>
<ereg regexp="call-id=\"([^\"]+)\"\s" search_in="body" check_it="true" assign_to="dummy,pickup_call_id"/> <ereg regexp="local-tag=\"([^\"]+)\"\s" search_in="body" check_it="true" assign_to="dummy,pickup_local_tag"/> <ereg regexp="remote-tag=\"([^\"]+)\"" search_in="body" check_it="true" assign_to="dummy,pickup_remote_tag"/>

scenario.send:
INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "SIP pickup test" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=inv[$local_tag] To: "[$cdpn]" <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Max-Forwards: 70 Replaces: [$pickup_call_id];to-tag=[$pickup_remote_tag];from-tag=[$pickup_local_tag] Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 123456 654321 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000
ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:[$cdpn]@[$new_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "SIP pickup test" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=inv[$local_tag] To: "[$cdpn]" <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]>[peer_tag_param] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] BYE Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0

SUBSCRIBE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "Тест PICK UP" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]>;tag=[$subscribe_remote_tag] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [cseq] SUBSCRIBE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Event: dialog Accept: application/dialog-info+xml Expires: 0 Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[$last_branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Length: 0

SUBSCRIBE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "Тест PICK UP" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]>;tag=[$subscribe_remote_tag] Call-ID: [call_id] [authentication] CSeq: [cseq] SUBSCRIBE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Event: dialog Accept: application/dialog-info+xml Expires: 0 Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[$last_branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Content-Length: 0

SUBSCRIBE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "Тест PICK UP" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=[$local_tag] To: <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> Call-ID: [call_id] [authentication] CSeq: [cseq] SUBSCRIBE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> Event: dialog Accept: application/dialog-info+xml Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[$last_branch] [last_from:] [last_to:] [last_call-id:] CSeq: [$last_cseq] ACK Content-Length: 0

INVITE sip:[$cdpn]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: "SIP pickup test" <sip:[service]@[$cgpn_dom]>;tag=inv[$local_tag] To: "[$cdpn]" <sip:[$cdpn]@[$cdpn_dom]> [last_call-id] CSeq: [cseq] INVITE Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:[local_port]> [authentication] Max-Forwards: 70 Replaces: [$pickup_call_id];to-tag=[$pickup_remote_tag];from-tag=[$pickup_local_tag] Content-Type: application/sdp Content-Length: [len]
v=0 o=tester 123456 654321 IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] s=A conversation c=IN IP[local_ip_type] [local_ip] t=0 0 m=audio [auto_media_port] RTP/AVP 8 a=rtpmap:8 PCMA/8000
